oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Provost Marshal pass for John H. Jennings, 2nd Tenn. Mtd. Inf., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This pass for Sgt. John H. Jennings, 2nd Tenn. Mtd. Inf., USA was generated by the Provost Marshal in Paducah, Ky. and allowed him through the lines to Cairo, Ill. Jennings was from Decatur County, Tenn. and enlisted at Clifton, Tenn. in April 1864. The pass was given to Jennings after his discharge from the Union army on May 6, 1865. After the war, he returned to Decatur County and started the Farmers Bank in Parsons, Tenn.
